question: In country A it is more likely that the time between 2 subsequent earthquakes is very short.

answers.feedback: Correct!, in country A it is less likely that the time between 2 subsequent earthquakes is very short, the pdf of $A$ is below the one of $B$ for small time intervals.

question: For large $t$ we have that $P(X_A \geq t) > P(X_B \geq t)$

answers.feedback: Correct!, for large $t$ we have that $P(A\geq t)$ > $P(B\geq t)$ (here the pdf of $A$ is above that of $B$)

question: The parameter $\lambda_i$ ($i=A,B$) is equal to the average time interval between 2 subsequent earthquakes

answers.feedback: Correct!, it is $1/\lambda_i$ being equal to the average time interval between 2 subsequent earthquakes
